Docs.summary: Gets a list of objects corresponding to enum constants defined in the given type. Also ensures the will round-trip even if it does not match a defined constant and sets the Selected property to true for one element in the returned list -- matching the .
Docs.returns: A list for the given , possibly extended to include an unrecognized .
